subject: Greetings from United Arab E
body:
Greetings from United Arab Emirate,
I have to start by introducing myself as an investment consultant
working under the mandate of Dubai Holding here in Dubai, UAE to reach
out to project owners and business men and women for funding
cooperation between their companies/firms and Dubai Holding.
The intent of this email is to seek possible collaborations in viable
investment and project development globally.
As a way of introduction, We are an investment portfolio enterprise
based and operating within the Middle East; mostly within Saudi Arabia
and United Arab Emirates (UAE) with other smaller portfolio management
and investments spread across the middle east and GCC countries. We
have never invested or managed any investment outside our region; this
is a new opportunity and new market we are hoping to penetrate.
As one of our post COVD 19 strategies, we are currently seeking viable
investment and projects globally, hopefully that can generate up to
10% ROI. We are looking to invest purely on a loan/debt financing
basis of 3.5% interest annually.
If a debt financing is within acceptable funding requirements for
projects and investment opportunities under your umbrella, we will be
interested to further discuss such opportunity and possibilities for
possible collaboration.
Kindly confirm the receipt of this email.
Sincere Regards,
Mr. Hassan le√†ndre Zoumara

subject: Re:   Greetings from United Arab E
body:
Hello Mr. Hassan le ndre Zoumara,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have shared about your role as an investment consultant working under Dubai Holding. It sounds like you are looking for potential investment opportunities and projects globally.

I'm curious to know more about the types of projects and businesses that Dubai Holding is interested in funding. Could you provide some examples or specific industries that you focus on? Additionally, what criteria do you consider when evaluating potential investments?

Furthermore, could you please explain a bit more about the loan debt financing basis of interest annually? How does this work exactly, and what are the terms and conditions associated with it?

Thank you again for contacting me, and I look forward to learning more about your investment opportunities.

Best wishes,
Susan
